Package rekit.logic

Interface Model

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameModel
public interface Model
This Interface defines the Model for the MVC.
Author:
Dominik Fuchss

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  Model.GameState
    This enum defines the different states of the game.

    • getPlayer

      Player getPlayer()
      Get the Player.
      Returns:
      the player or null when not in Model.GameState.INGAME

      Get the Menu.
      Returns:
      the menu or null when not in Model.GameState.MENU

      Start the model.

      End the model.

      Get the current scene. The scene to be drawn.
      Returns:

      Returns:

    • removeFilter

      void removeFilter()
      Remove all filters.

    • getFilter

      Filter getFilter()
      Get the current filter and reset filterChanged().
      Returns:
      the filter or null if none set

    • filterChanged

      boolean filterChanged()
      Indicates whether the filter has been changed.
      Returns:
      true if changed, false otherwise
